analysis.description:
ChangeCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x451f0ec8b803ab3707970555dda7b5da69b5d026.sol#352-365) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0x451f0ec8b803ab3707970555dda7b5da69b5d026.sol#362)

ChangeCoinCrowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/31/0x451f0ec8b803ab3707970555dda7b5da69b5d026.sol#369-374) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(multiSigWallet,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0x451f0ec8b803ab3707970555dda7b5da69b5d026.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/31/0x451f0ec8b803ab3707970555dda7b5da69b5d026.sol)
